name: ASME 'U' STAMP
description: The ASME 'U' Stamp authorizes us to manufacture pressure vessels in accordance with ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code, ensuring the highest safety and quality standards in pressure vessel manufacturing.
scope: Pressure vessel manufacturing according to ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code Section VIII

name: R STAMP
description: The R Stamp authorizes us to perform repairs and alterations on pressure vessels and boilers, demonstrating our capability to maintain and modify critical equipment safely and effectively.
scope: Repair and alteration of pressure vessels and boilers according to ASME standards

name: ISO 9001:2015
description: ISO 9001:2015 certification demonstrates our commitment to quality management systems, ensuring consistent products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements through continuous improvement processes.
scope: Quality management system for design, manufacturing, and supply of oil and gas equipment

name: ISO 14001:2015
description: ISO 14001:2015 environmental management system certification demonstrates our commitment to environmental responsibility and minimizing environmental impact through systematic environmental management practices.
scope: Environmental management system for manufacturing and service operations

name: ISO 45001:2018
description: ISO 45001:2018 occupational health and safety management system certification demonstrates our commitment to providing a safe and healthy workplace for all employees, contractors, and visitors.
scope: Occupational health and safety management system for all operations
